component.name: MarkPlayedTask
component.script:
sub init() m.top.functionName = "notifyServer" end sub
sub notifyServer() data = { "query": "mutation DoneWithMedia { markPlayed(uri: " + chr(34) + m.top.uri + chr(34) + ") }" } print "Notifying server about: " + m.top.uri response = Requests().post("http://192.168.1.2:2222/graphql", {"json": data})
if (response.statuscode = 200) then print "Notify success" m.top.allDone = True else print "Error code received: " + response.statuscode end if end sub
